Today [[user]] left for Japan to attend the G7 summit in Hiroshima. As world leaders meet in this historic city, I'm urging them to work together to promote global peace and security. Read more of my thoughts in my [[user]] op-ed below. [[url]]

The PACT Act is a new law passed by Congress that expands VA health care and benefits for veterans exposed to burn pits, Agent Orange, and other toxic substances. The PACT Act expands and extends eligibility for VA health care for veterans with toxic exposures and veterans of the Vietnam, Gulf War, and post - 9/11 era.
